extension.summary: Surveillance Room is a full featured IP Camera viewer for up to 4 IP Cameras. Works best with Foscam HD
extension.description: Originally designed for Foscam HD IP cameras, this addon can live stream and monitor motion and sound alarms for up to 4 IP Cameras. This script shows the video feed from up to 4 IP Cameras simultaneously, or individaully. It can detect motion or sound for Foscam HD cameras at the same time, or be called to show a preview by a button or a script.
extension.disclaimer: This add-on is not affiliated with Foscam. This add-on will modify some settings on the camera itself such as motion and sound detection settings.
